events.title: José de San Martín sets off to cross the Andes with his men

movie.title: San Martín: El cruce de Los Andes
movie.plot: The story follows a 15-year-old Manuel Corvalán, who decides to leave his upper-class family and be disinherited by his father to join the newly formed Army of the Andes, commanded by the General José de San Martín.

events.title: John Smith spends 15 minutes trapped under the ice of a frozen lake

movie.title: Breakthrough
movie.plot: When her 14-year-old son drowns in a lake, a faithful mother prays for him to come back from the brink of death and be healed.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 10 nominations.
